column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I made dinner reservations on a Tuesday evening for my bf's belated birthday celebration. The only open reservation (on Open Table) was at 8:45pm
column3: I saw many open tables. We were seated not too long after our arrival
column4: but it wasn't until we were already seated at our table did the hostess ask if we wanted to check in our coats.
